task.title: Installing Sametime on Docker
task.shortdesc: Installing Sametime involves starting the install procedure and specifying configuration information for the server, such as the credentials, the ports, MongoDB, and LDAP that the server uses.

taskbody.prereq: Download the product from the HCL Software Portal.

context.p: Docker commands are used throughout the install process. All commands require running as a root user. If not running as root user, you must preface all commands with sudo.

step.cmd: Verify that the product files downloaded and extract to the desired installation directory.
step.info:
Change to the installation directory and verify that the permissions are set correctly by running the following commands: # cd sametime_install # ls -la
Where sametime_install is the installation directory.

step.cmd: From the installation directory, run the Sametime install command.
step.stepresult: The install command begins the installation of the Sametime product.
